formattedAddress: 935 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 935 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028-0212, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Golio removed a large growth over my left eyelid. The results were fantastic. The area that was stitched is virtually undetectable, and that was only 3 weeks after the surgery. The growth was biopsied and was found benign.

text.text: Dr. Golio removed a large growth over my left eyelid. The results were fantastic. The area that was stitched is virtually undetectable, and that was only 3 weeks after the surgery. The growth was biopsied and was found benign.

originalText.text: I began to develop droopy eyes due to my age. I went in to see Dr. Golio and he had amazing hospitality. He thoroughly listened and performed my procedure with such delicacy and perfection. I seriously recommend Dr. Golio for any of your needs or wants.

text.text: I began to develop droopy eyes due to my age. I went in to see Dr. Golio and he had amazing hospitality. He thoroughly listened and performed my procedure with such delicacy and perfection. I seriously recommend Dr. Golio for any of your needs or wants.

originalText.text: This is not so much about the doctor, my experience with his staff is the problem. I was denied basic patient rights. I was not treated by the staff in a professional caring,helpful way. I was given false information by more than one of the staff. The staff makes things up as it please's them.   To all patients that may read this of any  doctor. A patient has the right to read,review and get a copy of his or her medical file from any doctor. And the staff cannot deny that right.Get copies of everything your doctor writes and puts in your chart. Everyone should do this.  Luanna you stepped on my rights as a patient. Shame!!!!
